reviewText: great flick. lots of shooting, speeding, and a good looking woman. great soundtrack, but i can't find the tune "pallas athena" that's part of the soundtrack. do yourself a favor and rent or buy this great anti-establishment adventure.

Ally Sheedy, David Carradine, Charles Napier (sheriff). This movie is not funny, it is somewhat exploitive. She hits a wolf on the road. She is brutally raped. There are quite a few murders with guns and explosions. There is a corrupt police force, I couldn't find anything funny. The sheriff is good in his part. It is very logical and real.  It is what REAL criminals would do instead of the usual bumbling mistakes in movies. Aren't you tired of people dropping guns?  The women are strong characters in most parts, still sensitive. The relationship between David Caradine and Ally Sheedy is interestingly written. It is Miss Positive people are good verses Mr. Negative, every man for himself. Guess which way it goes? The music is also good and fits the movie. Exec. Producer: Roger Corman

Following a fairly ordinary plot line (read humor): husband cheats, wife leaves, wife drives self into prison (metaphorically), Ally Sheedy reveals to us that the once highly revered Brat Pack's success quickly dimmed  during the early 1990s.  The film is packaged as an "erotic"  film, but merely sinks into a casaul "skin" flick with an R  rating.  Watch mainly to see how far the Pack has fallen only to  (hopefully) rise again, as Sheedy recently has.

Stupid movie. I can't believe I wasted my money on this filth. It is way too overpriced. This movie has a cheap storyline. The only interesting thing about it is the spectacular rape scene in it, other than that it is complete and utter senseless garbage.
Love it! I needed this for a particular collection and the price was great.
It had its good parts and its bad parts. The assault scene at the jail... BRUTAL! It's what made me keep watching to find out happens next!
This movie was very good. The actors were very good.  It had action and drama. I am going to watch It again!
I remember this movie from awhile back, so I thought I would pick it up. Glad to have been able to get it on dvd. Movie was as entertaining as I remembered.
It makes you wonder if this could actually happen. She pays him back for what he did for her, oh yea he definately got what what was coming to him.
a twist on how the victim becomes the victor they honored the original not for children but good action for adults

What a string of bad luck this woman runs into! I think women will find themselves talking to the screen after watching the decision the woman makes putting herself into the horrendous situations she faces.
